CREATE TABLE [Topic].[NATO_Topics_NER_LEM]
( 
	[id] bigint  NULL,
	[created_at] DATETIME2(7)  NULL,
	[text] NVARCHAR(4000)  NULL,
	[lang] nvarchar(10)  NULL,
	[retweet_count] INT  NULL,
	[reply_count] INT  NULL,
	[like_count] INT  NULL,
	[quote_count] INT  NULL,
	[impression_count] INT  NULL,
	[cleantext] NVARCHAR(4000)  NULL,
    [topic_0_confidence] FLOAT NULL,
    [topic_1_confidence] FLOAT NULL,
    [topic_2_confidence] FLOAT NULL,
    [topic_3_confidence] FLOAT NULL,
    [topic_4_confidence] FLOAT NULL,
	[topic] BIGINT NULL
)

GO

CREATE TABLE [Words].[NATO_Topic_Words_NER_LEM]
( 
	[topic] bigint  NULL,
	[word_1] NVARCHAR(20)  NULL,
	[word_2] NVARCHAR(20)  NULL,
    [word_3] NVARCHAR(20)  NULL,
    [word_4] NVARCHAR(20)  NULL,
    [word_5] NVARCHAR(20)  NULL,
    [word_6] NVARCHAR(20)  NULL,
    [word_7] NVARCHAR(20)  NULL,
    [word_8] NVARCHAR(20)  NULL,
    [word_9] NVARCHAR(20)  NULL,
    [word_10] NVARCHAR(20)  NULL
)

GO
